### Hotel information

Workshop will be hosted by [Svornost Hotel](https://www.hotelsvornost.cz/en/)

Address: Harrachov 496, 512 46 HARRACHOV, Česká Republika

### Reservation possibilities

- 1 participant in a single room
- 1 participant in a double room
- 1 participant in a double room with spouse/partner

To reserve a room, write an e-mail to [Iva Prochazkova](mailto:iva.prochazkova@montevallo.cz)
